Best Practices

Keep Dependencies Updated

Regularly update your stack dependencies to benefit from security patches and new features.

Use Environment Variables

Store sensitive configuration in environment variables, not in your codebase.

Automate Testing

Set up automated tests to catch bugs early and ensure reliability.

Document Your Stack

Maintain clear documentation for your stack choices and architecture.
